column1: Kata Robata////The Wagyu beef sandos are a must try
column2: the lobster mac was rich and delicious
column3: and all of my nigiri was fresh and yummy. I also had two of their signature rolls
column4: the ocean picante and tropical spicy tuna and they did not disappoint. I would definitely order takeout from here again
column5: and a huge plus is that they quote you about 15 minutes from your order being placed
column6: and they are pretty close to that already short window which is awesome!
